overview: Zoey is fed up with her deadbeat husband so she calls over the pool boy for some maintenance; the only problem is they don't have a pool. Dyanna is in a deep depression that is ruining her marriage. Her husband is eager to help her, even if it means bringing in reinment. Syren is bored sitting through her husband's meetings so she decides to make him sit through a meeting he'll never forget. Taylor invites a friend over from her painting class. Her husband is thrilled until he realizes her friend is a well hung nude model. Anjanette had a horrible day shopping and her husband is desperate to find her something she loves, even if it is a monster black cock.
title: Mom's Cuckold 5
